tool_description: a simple api that show  list of universities worldwide especially located in USA and Europe
name: world univ
title: world univ

api_list.name: Get top Oceania universities_copy
api_list.description: this endpoint will return the top universities in Oceania According to the QS World University Rankings 2022.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://world-univ.p.rapidapi.com/top/Oceania"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "world-univ.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
